sentences.en: He had sympathy with those who were brought low by misfortune.
sentences.cn: 对于那些因不幸而陷入贫困的人们他表示了同情.

sentences.en: He has known great misfortune in his life.
sentences.cn: 他一生中经历过巨大的不幸。

sentences.en: He was dogged by his misfortune.
sentences.cn: 不幸的事总是纠缠着他.

sentences.en: Innocent people get into trouble on account of others'misfortune.
It is said to be an omen of misfortune.
sentences.cn: 那被认为是一种不幸的先兆.

sentences.en: It seems the banks always profit from farmers’ misfortunes.
sentences.cn: 银行似乎总是从农民的不幸中获益。

sentences.en: She had the misfortune to break her leg.
She is not a stranger to misfortune.
sentences.cn: 她对不幸的经历并不陌生.

sentences.en: Some of my friends estranged themselves from me in my misfortune.
sentences.cn: 我倒霉时,有些朋友就疏远了我.

sentences.en: That's probably the most bare and bleak island I've ever had the misfortune to clap eyes on.
sentences.cn: 那可能是我不幸看到的最光秃、最荒凉的岛屿。

sentences.en: The old woman repined at her misfortune.
sentences.cn: 那老妇人怨叹不幸的遭遇.

sentences.en: There is no highroad to happiness or misfortune ; every man brings them on himself.
sentences.cn: 祸福无门, 唯人自召[招].

sentences.en: We become companion in misfortune from then on.
sentences.cn: 从那时起,我们就成了患难之交.

sentences.en: We know instinctively, just as bookeepers with their bees that misfortune might overtake us if the important events of our lives were not related to it.
sentences.cn: 正如养蜂人与蜜蜂的关系一样,我们本能地懂得如果我们不把自己生活中重大事件告诉它的话,不幸的事情就会袭击我们.

sentences.en: Were it not for this misfortune, he might never have been forced into the business of grinding out novels to support his family.
sentences.cn: 要不是因为这一不幸变故，他可能永远都不会迫于无奈地开始流水线式创作小说养家糊口。

trans.tran_cn: 不幸，厄运，灾难，不幸事故
trans.tran_en: very bad luck, or something that happens to you as a result of bad luck
